pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plot Raster Map Tiles from Open Street Map and Other Sources // Download and plot Open Street Map http://www.openstreetmap.org/, Bing Maps http://www.bing.com/maps and other tiled map sources in a way that works seamlessly with plotting from the 'sp' package. Use to create high-resolution basemaps and add hillshade to vector- based maps.
